title: @Statikk Corki and Sheen?
body:
I've done bug reports on both PBE and Live servers and even posted on the main Corki thread...

Is Sheen and Trinity Force going to work with his passive or NOT? The main Corki feedback page has stated it's -supposed- to, yet not a single red has even confirmed or denied if it's GOING to or if it's even SUPPOSED to work. Some sort of communication would be appreciated here.
